title: Diamond Ring
description:
A simple yet elegant diamond ring. Perhaps intended as a gift, or for a proposal.

Who would leave this lying around?

title: Shiny Key
description:
A standard key, with a 'Loftwood Estate Agents'-branded keychain.

It's unusually shiny, perhaps only recently cut.

title: Church Key
description:
A badly-rusted key to the church by the lake.

You can feel the warmth it absorbed from the fire.

title: Small Doll
description:
This small doll was once brightly-painted, but has been worn down to the wood.

Listen close, you can hear it whisper: "hold us close, walk out over the lake and see your final answers".

title: Old Letter
description:
A handwritten letter, it's been left outside and is now mostly unreadable. 

You can still make out a small fragment of text: "... the others have left me now. They told me ... the key to the church and I ... forgetting everything, what if ... and it's gone forever. So I'll wait, I'll ... come back to me, I hope ... ".
